name: Calculator Agent
description: A specialized agent that performs mathematical calculations including basic arithmetic, trigonometry, logarithms, unit conversions, and percentage calculations.

skills.name: Mathematical Expression Evaluation
skills.description: Evaluate mathematical expressions including arithmetic operations (+, -, *, /, **, %), square roots, trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan), logarithms, and exponentials.

skills.name: Unit Conversion
skills.description: Convert between various units: length (meters, kilometers, miles, feet, inches), temperature (celsius, fahrenheit, kelvin), and weight (kilograms, pounds, grams, ounces).

skills.name: Percentage Calculations
skills.description: Calculate percentages of numbers, find what percentage one number is of another, and compute percentage increases or decreases.
